name: Aokana - Four Rhythms Across the Blue
description:
This game has a surprisingly decent anime: https://anilist.co/anime/21319/Ao-no-Kanata-no-Four-Rhythm

Believe me when I say that you'll want flying shoes after playing this game. Also Misaki best girl.
AoKana is probably the most vanilla you can get in this list. Set on some random-ass island in Japan, you become the trainer of a few school girls participating in a sport called "Flying Circus". Of course the characters have to wear skimpy body suits, because yes. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Overall the game is pretty wholesome, the characters are neat, good humor, alright MC. Tl;dr: Go for it.
